scripts.all: npm run clone && npm install && npm run build
scripts.clone: npm run clone:monitor && npm run clone:gateway && npm run clone:oauth && npm run clone:files && npm run clone:log && npm run clone:mail && npm run clone:web
scripts.install: npm run install:monitor && npm run install:gateway && npm run install:oauth && npm run install:files && npm run install:log && npm run install:mail && npm run install:web
scripts.build: cd api-monitor && tsc && cd ../api-gateway && tsc && cd ../files && tsc && cd ../log && tsc && cd ../mail && tsc && cd ../oauth && tsc
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:oauth" "npm run start:files" "npm run start:log" "npm run start:mail" "npm run start:monitor"
scripts.pm2: npm run pm2:oauth && npm run pm2:files && npm run pm2:log && npm run pm2:mail && npm run pm2:gateway && npm run pm2:monitor
scripts.pull: npm run pull:monitor && npm run pull:gateway && npm run pull:oauth && npm run pull:files && npm run pull:log && npm run pull:mail && npm run pull:web
scripts.update: npm run update:monitor && npm run update:gateway && npm run update:oauth && npm run update:files && npm run update:log && npm run update:mail
